Name: ASP.NET Core - set runtime environment variable via web.config
Description: ASP.NET Core allows you specify environment variables in web.config - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/hosting/aspnet-core-module#setting-environment-variables

Parameters.Name: anc_WebConfigPath
Parameters.Label: Web.Config Path
Parameters.HelpText: Typically an output variable from a previous step

Parameters.Name: anc_EnvironmentVariableName
Parameters.Label: Environment Variable Name
Parameters.HelpText: Name of environment variable to set

Parameters.Name: anc_EnvironmentVariableValue
Parameters.Label: Environment Variable Value
Parameters.HelpText: Value of environment variable to set
